workouts.title: Create & Assign Workouts
workouts.description: Coaches can easily create, customize, and assign workouts to their athletes.

completion.title: Easy Completion
completion.description: Athletes receive and complete workouts with a simple, intuitive interface.

progress.title: Smart Progress
progress.description: Secure payments and intelligent tracking to monitor progress effectively.

trainers.title: For Trainers
trainers.feature2: Assign workouts to individual athletes or groups
trainers.feature4: Track athlete progress and completion rates

athletes.title: For Athletes
athletes.feature4: Track your training progress over time

app.title: Get the Fitzio App

cta.title: STAY CONNECTED WITH FITZIO
cta.subtitle: Subscribe to our newsletter for updates, fitness tips, and exclusive content.
cta.feature_two: Be the first to know about new features

adminFeatures.title: Shave hours off program admin work and upgrade your coaching experience with our personal trainer app

connect.title: Connect, Engage, & End Accountability Issues
connect.description: We do the math on compliance numbers for every client program you create. You get an overall snapshot or individual details so you can give your attention to clients who need it, and use your coaching skills to move them forward.

track.title: Effortlessly Track & Measure Client Data
track.description: Your clients can enter their workout data for each workout. Make quality decisions about their next progression with easy-to-see training data at your fingertips.

delivery.title: Double Down On Delivery Output & Reclaim Time
delivery.description: Our PT software includes a workout builder. It gives you a big-picture view of a month in the past or in advance, so you know what your clients did or need while you're designing. This enables you to fast-track design, creation, and delivery.

video.title: Self-Branded Video Exercise Demos
video.description: No more curating workouts on YouTube and linking them to exercises on a spreadsheet. Create your own videos, upload them to Fitzio, and it'll auto-link. Or use our library of over 1,200+ pre-loaded strength and conditioning exercise videos.

mainFeatures.title: Spend More Time Coaching Your Clients At Scale And Less Time On Admin With The Best Personal Training Software

workout.title: Easy Client Workout Logging
workout.description: Your clients can quickly log their workouts, review past results, post comments, or ask you questions all from the free Fitzio mobile app.

businessFeatures.title: Spend More Time On Coaching Your Clients At Scale And Less Time On Admin With The Best Personal Training Software

client.title: Client Management
client.description: Using our personal trainer software, Manage all of your clients and their workouts in one place. We make it easy to add new clients, deliver personalized workout plans, track progress, and stay on top of communication

payments.title: Payments
payments.description: Keep all of your admin tasks in one place with Fitzio Payments. Set up through Stripe, Fitzio Payments makes collecting your revenue a breeze by accepting credit and debit card payments almost instantly.

progress.title: Progress Tracking
progress.description: We make it easy to track exercise history and metrics, so both you and your clients can log results and visualize progress towards specific goals over time.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.intro: At Fitzio, we are committed to protecting your privacy. We collect the following information:

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.intro: We use the collected information to:
section2.item3: Enable communication between trainers and athletes
section2.item4: Analyze trends and improve the platform
section2.item5: Send important notifications about your account

section3.title: 3. Data Sharing
section3.intro: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. We share information in the following circumstances:
section3.item1: Between trainers and athletes who are connected on the platform
section3.item2: With service providers who help us operate the platform
section3.item3: When required by law or to protect our rights

section4.title: 4. Data Security
section4.content: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure or destruction.

section5.title: 5. Your Rights
section5.intro: As a user, you have the right to:
section5.item3: Delete your account and associated data
section5.item5: Request a copy of your data

section6.title: 6. Cookies and Similar Technologies
section6.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience, understand how you use our services, and personalize content.

section7.title: 7. Changes to This Policy
section7.content: We may update this privacy policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes through a notice on our application or by email.

section8.title: 8. Contact
section8.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy or how we handle your data, contact us at:
